title: Oce down
body:
Just warming up in a normal match. Killing some scrubs raging at some noobs and bam servers go down. 

Now riot what is it this time?

replies.body: It's doing it for me too. It's taking 5 minutes saying it's logging on than it says unable to connect to PVP.net
Might need a new toaster friend.
I laughed so hard at that comment..
